page.title: 19ARTS AND CRAFT (CONT.)
page.content: {In the Workshops there are}25 professional craftspeople sharing 11 {workshops,}including weaver,potter, saddler,blacksmith,jeweller,leather designer,bookbinder,etcher,basket maker,antique restorer,embroiderer and brewer.Visitors can watch all of these people working and some come for lessons.There is{a shop}selling locally made articles.Cards and wrapping paper sell well.One sales lady works there as a break from looking after her young children.She likes seeing how talented the craftsmen are and enjoys working in an unspoilt area where the way of life is unhurried.People think the prices are high but worth it because everything is handmade and unique.THere is a {Gallery}where art and craft work is exhibited,a study room and{a coffee {shop}which sells home made food.
